snippet: Oracle is acquiring Taleo, a maker of online human resources software, as it continues to expand its footprint in so-called cloud services.
abstract: Oracle is acquiring Taleo, a maker of online human resources software, as it continues to expand its footprint in so-called cloud services.

headline.main: Oracle Embraces the Cloud With $1.9 Billion Taleo Deal
headline.print_headline: Oracle, Once a Skeptic, Extends Cloud Holdings by Buying Taleo for $1.9 Billion
